Quickly add bookmarks to YABA with **тМШтЗзY (Command + Shift + Y)**. A window will pop up for you to paste your link. YABA will fetch the title automatically within seconds, but we recommend writing your own title to make finding it later even easier.

To use the quick key **(тМШтЗзY)** and open the quick share/save pop-up, the menu bar item must be running. The menu bar item also makes it easy to browse your recently saved bookmarks or open the quick share/save pop-up with a single click.
You can enable or disable the menu bar item anytime in Settings.
